meanings.definition: The action of joining or connecting two things together.
meanings.sent1: The coupling of the train cars was done carefully to ensure a smooth ride.
meanings.sent2: The plumber used a coupling to connect the two pipes together.
meanings.sent3: The coupling of the puzzle pieces was so satisfying when they fit perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a strong coupling, unbreakable and reliable.
meanings.sent5: The coupling of the gears in the clock made the ticking sound rhythmic and soothing.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism for connecting two parts together.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic used a coupling to fix the broken engine parts.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use the right coupling to connect the hoses securely.
meanings.sent3: The coupling on the tool belt was so handy, keeping all the tools in place.
meanings.sent4: The coupling between the car and the trailer was strong, ensuring a safe journey.
meanings.sent5: The coupling on the necklace clasp made it easy to put on and take off.

meanings.definition: The act of forming a pair or bond.
meanings.sent1: The coupling of the dancers on stage was graceful and synchronized.
meanings.sent2: The coupling of the electrons in the atoms creates chemical bonds.
meanings.sent3: The coupling of the socks in the laundry seems to always go missing.
meanings.sent4: The coupling of the voices in the choir created a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The coupling of the magnets demonstrated the attraction between them.
